original_title: Sri Lanka rupee at 305.00/30 against the US dollar, bond yields unchanged
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT- Sri Lanka’s bond yields slightly up at open on Thursday and the rupee opened stronger at 305.00/30 against the US dollar in the spot market, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.09.2027 was quoted at 27.25/75 percent unchanged from Wednesday’s close.
The rupee opened at 305.00/30 against the US dollar in the spot market steady from the last close at 305.80/306.20 (Colombo/May17/2023)
